videoSnippet.title: Magnus Carlsen is World Rapid Champion!
videoSnippet.description:
Photos by Lenart Ootes
Have a great day :)

Carlsen, Magnus (2834) - Maghsoodloo, Parham (2656)
FIDE World Rapid Championship (chess24.com) [13] 2022.12.28
B67 Sicilian, Richter-Rauzer, Rauzer attack, 7...a6 defence, 8...Bd7

1.e4 c5 2.Nf3 d6 3.d4 cxd4 4.Nxd4 Nf6 5.Nc3 Nc6 6.Bg5 e6 7.Qd2 a6 8.O-O-O Bd7 9.f3 Nxd4 10.Qxd4 Be7 11.Kb1 b5 12.h4 Rb8 13.g4 b4 14.Ne2 a5 15.Ng3 Qc7 16.Be3 Rc8 17.Rh2 d5 18.e5 O-O 19.Ba6 Ra8 20.Bd3 Rfc8 21.Qf4 Ne8 22.g5 Bc5 23.Bxc5 Qxc5 24.h5 Bb5 25.Bxh7+ Kxh7 26.g6+ fxg6 27.Qf7 g5 28.h6

00:00 Hello Everyone!

The FIDE Women's World Rapid Championship is an 11-round Swiss tournament taking place from 26–28 December 2022 in Almaty, Kazakhstan. The prize fund is $150,000, with a $40,000 top prize.

Players receive 15 minutes for the entire game, plus a 10-second increment starting from move one. A tie for 1st is decided by two 3+2 blitz games. If still tied, more 3+2 games are played until a player wins. Official website: worldrapidandblitz2022.fide.com

Kf8 h6 b3 axb3 gxh6 g6 Qa7 Qxh6+ Ke7 gxf7 Nc7 Nf5+ Kd7 Nd4

judgment.name: Blunder
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Kf8 was best.

analysis.variation: hxg6+ Kxg6 Ne4 Nf6 Nxc5 Kf7 exf6 Bd3 fxg7+ Ke7 Nxd3 Rab8 g8=Q Kd7

judgment.name: Mistake
judgment.comment: Lost forced checkmate sequence. hxg6+ was best.
